sentences.sContent: His family responsibilities had started to become a burden.
sentences.sCn: 家庭责任已开始成为他的负担。

sentences.sContent: ...while at the same time contributing disproportionately to the global burden of climate change...
...That conclusion was reinforced by another finding: that their opposition appeared to soften when that fiscal burden decreased...
...she felt a burden lifting from her shoulders...

phrases.pCn: 举证责任；提供证据之责任
n. 财政负担，经济负担

remMethod.val: burd(看作bird) ＋ en → 鸟负重就飞不动了 → 负担

trans.tranOther: something difficult or worrying that you are responsible for
